text: State unemployment rates in July 2025 ranged from 1.9% in SD to 6.0% in DC.
Q1 2025 real state GDP growth over the year ranged from -0.7% in IA to 3.5% in AL and AR.
Q1 2025 house price growth over the year ranged from -2.2% in HI to 11.4% in RI.
Among states, July 2025 average weekly earnings ranged from NM’s $965 to WA’s $1,451.
In July 2025, federal gov. jobs dropped year-over-year in 45 states and DC, led by MD.
TN’s real accommodation and food services GDP has grown 48 percent over the past 20 years.
Only ND has seen year-over-year house price growth every quarter since Q1 2011.
In July 2025, manufacturing employment fell year-over-year in 29 states.
Every state and DC saw year-over-year retail GDP growth exceed 2% in real terms in Q1 2025.
